content.json:
## Lumen Threat Intelligence Overview
This dashboard summarizes threat intelligence indicators provided by Lumen.

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| summarize TotalIndicators = count(), UniqueTypes = dcount(Type), MaxConfidence = max(Confidence), Recent = max(TimeGenerated)
content.title: Summary KPIs

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Indicators Over Time

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| summarize Count = count() by Type
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Top Indicator Types

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| mv-expand Label = Labels
| summarize Count = count() by Label
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Top Labels

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| summarize Count = count() by Confidence
| top 10 by Confidence desc
content.title: Top Confidence Scores

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen'
| summarize Count = count() by Type
| top 5 by Count desc
content.title: Indicator Type Distribution

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen' and Confidence >= 80
| project TimeGenerated, Type, Confidence, Pattern, Labels, ValidUntil, Country, SourceSystem
| top 20 by Confidence desc
content.title: Recent High-Confidence Lumen Indicators

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicators
| where SourceSystem == 'Lumen' and isnotempty(Latitude) and isnotempty(Longitude)
| summarize arg_max(Confidence, *) by Latitude, Longitude
| project Latitude, Longitude, Confidence, Type, Pattern, Labels, Country
content.title: Top Threats by Geolocation
